page.title: 11SHOW EVENTS, WESTWOODSIDE
page.content:
There are many different sections to the{show}- horticultural, handicrafts, childrens cookery, and hand work, rabbit and cavy show, dog show and horse jumping. There are all types of show horses including the famous shire horses. There is a cattle show, children's riding classes, and pony club game competition.
The running of an outdoor event is very costly when tentage and many other expensive items are involved. The weather plays an important part in the success of the show. Any money gained one year must be saved for the show to survive a bad year.
